gameDetails.name: Arcadia Quest: Healing Fountain
gameDetails.description:
Originally included in the Brettspiel Adventskalender 2016 for day 23, this promo includes a Healing Fountain tile and 2 Green Portal Exploration tokens, as well as the rules necessary to use them.

Setup

Shuffle both Green Portal tokens with the other Exploration tokens from the base game and place them face down on the board following the instructions of the scenario.

Place the Healing Fountain secret room tile next to the board.

Rules

When a Hero reveals one of the Green Portal tokens, it is flipped face up and stays on that Space. The Green Portal token can never be collected.

Green Portals work like the standard Portals in the game. Characters can spend one Movement Point to move from one Green Portal to any other Green Portal, whether it's to the Healing Fountain secret room, or to the other Green Portal Exploration Token (if it's been revealed).

Each time a Hero or a Pet enters the Healing Fountain secret room, they may heal 1 Wound and unexhaust 1 card of their choice.
